analyzed: iha ca tejaḥ tejaḥ tvasya mṛd ghaṭe sataḥ ghaṭa tvasya ghaṭa tva parihāreṇa āloka ādau sataḥ tejaḥ tvasya

sakṛt prayoktena liṅ śabdena avṛttim vinā upasthiti asaṃbhavāt
anyathā vājipeya adhikaraṇe pi pūrvapakṣa rītyā yajinā
tayoḥ yugapad upasthiti saṃbhavena tad asaṃbhava nibandhanaḥ siddhāntaḥ na sidhyet
tad prayojakayoḥ asiddha tvayoḥ ekadā ekasmin virodhāt
kāla bhadena tu na viruddham

original: asiddhatākāle sādhyatvasya siddhatvadaśāyāṃ sādhanatvasya ca saṃbhavāt /
analyzed: asiddha tā kāle sādhya tvasya siddha tva daśāyām sādhana tvasya ca saṃbhavāt
tathā api iti arthaḥ
upasthiti asaṃbhavāt iti
sādhyatva sādhana tvayoḥ iti anuṣaṅgaḥ
anyathā iti āvṛttim vinā api yugapad upasthitau iti arthaḥ

original: ādyasya caturthapāde“nāmadheye guṇaśruteḥ syādvidhānamiti cedi“ti pañcame 'dhikaraṇe
analyzed: ādyasya caturtha pāde nāmadheye guṇa śruteḥ syāt vidhānam iti ced iti pañcame dhikaraṇe

original: saṃśaye 3 yajeteti śrutyā 4 khyātopāttaprayatnāparaparyāyabhāvanayā yāgasya prakṛtipratyasamabhivyāhārabalenakarmatva
analyzed: saṃśaye yajeta iti śrutyā khyāta upātta prayatna apara paryāya bhāvanayā yāgasya

original: peyarūpavājena yāgaṃ kuryādityanvayasya yugapadeva saṃbhavādguṇavidhipara iti prāpte
analyzed: peya rūpa vājena yāgam kuryāt iti anvayasya yugapad eva saṃbhavāt guṇa vidhi paraḥ iti prāpte

original: bodhamupetya phalānvaya eva vācyaḥ vājapeyapadaṃ tu nāmadheyamiti siddhāntitam / @-------------------------------------------------------------------------

original: 1.tu vi-naṃ.u. 2.tra kiṃ vā-naṃ.u. 3.ye yāya -u. e 4.tyākhyā naṃ.u. 5.sthala catuṣṭaye karaṇa ityevāsti - naṃ. u. e. @-------------------------------------------------------------------------
analyzed: tu vi naṃu tra kim sthala catuṣṭaye karaṇa iti eva asti

original: api ca na kṛtisādhyatvena jñānamātraṃ pravartakam /
analyzed: api ca na kṛti sādhya tvena jñāna mātram pravartakam
anya kṛti sādhya tve sva kṛtya sādhya tve pravṛti adarśanāt
kim tu sva kṛta sādhya tvena
na ca śabdena sva kṛti sādhya tvam bodhyate

original: kiṃ tvayaṃ yāgo matkṛtisādhyo matkṛtiṃ vināsatvāt ityanumānena 1 /
analyzed: kim tu ayam yāgaḥ mad kṛti sādhyaḥ mad kṛtim vinā asatvāt iti anumānena
tathā ca pravartakam jñānam ānumānikam syāt
na tu śābdāt

original: na ca pravartakajñānajanakasya liṅgasya śabdenopasthāpanācchābdatvamiti vācyam /
analyzed: na ca pravartaka jñāna janakasya liṅgasya śabdena upasthāpanāt śābda tvam iti vācyam
ayam yāgaḥ svarga kāmena mayā kartavyaḥ svarga kāma pada samabhivyāhṛta pramāṇa vākya stha liṅ śiraska a dhātvartha tvāt
yat evam tat evam yathā odana kāma pada samabhivyāhṛta āpta vākya stha viṣ śiraska paci dhātvartha

original: ityanumānenaiva sarvasya siddhyā liṅa ākhyātāntaravatkṛtirevārtho na tviṣṭasādhanatvamapītyāpatteḥ //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
analyzed: iti anumānena eva sarvasya siddhyā liṅaḥ ākhyāta antara vat kṛtiḥ eva arthaḥ na tu iṣṭa sādhana tvam api iti āpatteḥ
tad siddhānta bhaṅga prasaṅgaḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: kṛtisādhyatveṣṭasādhanatvayorupasthāpakatvāyogāt na viśiṣṭaṃ viṅādividhipratyayārthopi tu tadupasthiteranyataḥ siddhatvānna liṅgādestadarthakatvamityāha  #
analyzed: kṛti sādhya tva iṣṭa sādhana tvayoḥ upasthāpaka tva ayogāt na viśiṣṭam tu tad upasthiteḥ anyatas siddhatvāt na liṅga ādeḥ tad arthaka tvam iti āha  /
api ca iti
iti anumānena eva iti
tathā eva vidhi vāde tvayā ukteḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: 1.naiva / evaṃ ca liṅā kṛtisādhye yāge svargasādhanatvenoktemānāntareṇa ca svakṛtacisādhyatve buddhe svargaṃ kṛtyā sādhayiṣyāmīti phalecchāyāṃ  #
analyzed: na eva evam ca liṅā kṛti sādhye yāge svarga sādhana tvena ukta imāna antareṇa ca sva kṛta ci sādhya tve buddhe svargam kṛtyā sādhayiṣyāmi iti phala icchāyām
ca satyām yāge cikīrṣā ākṛtī bhavataḥ
tasmāt āvaśyakyāḥ yatnena phalam sādhayiṣyāmi iti phala icchayā eva atiprasaṅga nivāraṇāt
sva kṛti sādhya tvasya anvaya vyatireka gamya tvena śabda abodhya tvāt
viruddha trika
vṛtti dvaya āpātāt ca
kṛti sādhya tvam api na liṅ arthaḥ
itas etat eva abhipretya eti va paryantasya sthāne ityam asti
kṛ sātvat iṣṭe sātva vi tu aṅgaḥ
vidhi vādaḥ

original: manmate tu svakṛtisādhyatvajñānaṃ na pravartakamiti nānumānāpekṣā / yāge
analyzed: mad mate tu sva kṛti sādhya tva jñānam na pravartakam iti na anumāna apekṣā yāge

original: svargasādhanatvena jñāte svasyoktāyāṃ svargecchāyāṃ ca satyāṃ pravṛttāvavatilambāt /
analyzed: svarga sādhana tvena jñāte svasya uktāyām svarga icchāyām ca satyām pravṛttau avatilambāt
tasmāt kṛti sādhya tvam api na liṅ arthaḥ
etat eva abhipretya sudhāyām kṛti sādhya tva viśeṇasya vyartha tvāt iti uktam
pravṛtti kāraṇāni niṣkṛṣya āha evam ca iti
sva kṛti sādhya tva jñānasya ānumānika tve sati iti arthaḥ
pravṛtti śabda artha vivaraṇam cikīrṣā ākṛtī bhavataḥ iti
upasaṃharati tasmāt iti
tasmāt iti parāmṛṣṭam hetu trayam vyanakti āvaśyaka ityādinā
iti phala icchayā iti
kṛti sādhya tva prakāraka phala viśeṣyaka icchayā eva pravṛtti hetu sāmagrī koṭi praviṣṭayā niṣiddha karmaṇi pravṛtti rūpa atiprasaṅga nivāraṇāt iti arthaḥ
viruddha trika iti

original: “vājapeyena svārājyakāmo yajete“tyādau yaji 1 noktayāgasya uddeśyatvānuvādyatvaprādhānyarūpa dharmatrayaṃ,
analyzed: vājapeyena svārājya kāmaḥ yajeta ityādau yaji na ukta yāgasya dharma trayam
sādhana tatva samāna adhikaraṇam upādeya tva vidheya tva guṇa tva rūpa dharma trayam
paraspara viruddham uddeśya tva ādi dharma trayasya yathākram upādeya tva ādi dharma traya pratidvandvi tvāt viruddham yat trika dvayam tasya yāge āpātāt ca iti
kim ca ityādinā ukta hetu uvādaḥ
api ca ityādinā uktasya kṛti anvaya vyatireka gamya tvena iti uktasya ca eka prameya tvāt pūrvam anuvādaḥ kutas
nanu tathā api ityādinā upapāditam artham mūla ārūḍham karoti etat eva iti

original: jijñāsādhikaraṇe“kāryatā ca na kācitsyā“dityādiparakīyakāryatākhaṇḍanaprakaraṇe“tadiṣṭaṃ sādhanaṃ tathā“ityupasaṃhāravākyavyākhyāvasare sudhāyāmuktamityarthaḥ
analyzed: jijñāsā adhikaraṇe kāryatā ca na kācid syāt ityādi parakīya kāryatā khaṇḍana prakaraṇe tat iṣṭam sādhanam tathā iti upasaṃhāra vākya vyākhyā avasare sudhāyām uktam iti arthaḥ
kṛti sādhya tā iti
kṛti sādhya tayā ekasmin arthe samavatā yā iṣṭa sādhana tā tad jñānāt iti arthaḥ
jinā yā naṃ
na ca evam sudhāyāḥ
kṛti sādhya tā ekārtha samaveta iṣṭa sādhana tā jñānāt eva pravṛti upapattar iti karmanirṇayaṭīkāyā

original: kṛtisādhyeṣṭasādhanatāyāḥ kāryatā 1 paryāyatvāditi niṣṇutatvanirṇayaṭīkāyā ca saha virodha iti vācyam /
analyzed: kṛti sādhya iṣṭa sādhana tāyāḥ kārya tā paryāya tvāt iti niṣṇutatvanirṇayaṭīkāyā ca saha virodhaḥ iti vācyam
sudhayā nirṇayaṭīkā yabhyām uktām māna antara jasya kṛti sādhya tva jñānasya pravṛtti hetutām
svīkṛtya eva kṛti sādhya tvasya liṅ artha tva mātra niṣedhāt

original: ata eva karmanirṇaye liṅādyarthastviṣṭasādhanatvameveti liṅādesttviṣṭasādhanatārthatvenaiva kṛtārthatvamiti coktam /
analyzed: atas eva karma nirṇaye liṅ ādi arthaḥ tu iṣṭa sādhanatvam eva iti liṅ ādeḥ tu iṣṭa sādhanatā arthatvena eva kṛtārtha tvam iti ca uktam
tad ṭīkāyām api kṛti sādhya tāyāḥ
jñānāt iti liṅga ādi śabda janyāt iti śeṣaḥ
iti karma nirṣaya ṭīkayā iti

original: na ca siddher'thache vākyasya prāmāṇyābhāvādityādiprakaraṇena 2 cārthāpattiḥ anupapattyabhāvādityetavdyākhyānarūpayetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: na ca vākyasya prāmāṇya abhāvāt ityādi prakaraṇena ca arthāpattiḥ anupapatti abhāvāt iti etad vyākhyāna rūpayā iti arthaḥ
tatvanirṇaya ṭīkayā iti
jñātvā eva hi iṣṭa sādhana tām pravartate
nivartate ca viparyayeṇa iti etad vyākhyāna rūpā iti arthaḥ
sudhayā iti
tṛtīyā antasya niṣethāt iti anvayaḥ
nirṇaya ṭīkābhyām iti
prāk ukta karma nirṇaya tatva nirṇaya ṭākā vākyābhyām iti arthaḥ
kṛti sādhya tvasya liṅ ādi artha tva abhāvāt ava iti arthaḥ
tad ṭīkā ayam api iti
atas eva iti anuṣaṅgaḥ
ta a para paryāḥ ga naṃ rāsu vā arthām naṃu
kṛ sātvat iṣṭe sātva vi tu aṅgaḥ
vidhi vādaḥ
svarūpataḥ muktvā iṣṭa sādhana tāyāḥ jñānam uktam
etat api uktam iṣṭa sādhanatām eva iti
na tu kṛti sādhya tva viśeṣitām iti arthaḥ
śabdāt ita śeṣaḥ

original: kṛtisādhyatvasya liṅādyarthatvābhāvena tajjñānajanakasya kasya cidapi śabdasyābhāvādeva
analyzed: kṛti sādhya tvasya liṅ ādi artha tva abhāvena tad jñāna janakasya kasya cid api śabdasya abhāvāt eva
karmanirṇaya ṭīkāyām kṛti sādhya tā eka artha samavetā iti pūrva vākye kṛti sādhya tā viśiṣṭa iṣṭa sādhana tā jñānāt iti evaṃrūpa vākya vinyāsena
viṅ ādi janya jñāna viṣaya koṭau kṛti sādhya tvasya praveśam a kṛtvā kṛti sādhya tā ekārthā ityādi rūpeṇa iṣṭa asādhanatayā
liṅ ādi vācyayā sākam yāga ādi kriyā niṣṭhatva mātram kṛti sādhyatvasya uktam
na tu tasya api liṅ ādi janya jñāna viṣaya tvam api iti arthaḥ
karma nirṇaya taṭṭīkābhyām eka artha tvam
tatva nirṇaya vākyasya āha etat api iti

original: liṅādinā pravṛttikāraṇamiṣṭasādhanatājñānameva jāyate na tu kṛtisādhyatājñānapītyetadapītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: liṅ ādinā pravṛtti kāraṇam iṣṭa sādhana tā jñānam eva jāyate na tu kṛti sādhya tā jñān api iti etat api iti arthaḥ
pūrva ukta artha samuccaye pipadam
aikārthya ghaṭanāya tatva nirṇaya vākye dhyāhāram āha śabdāt iti śeṣaḥ iti

original: liṅādiśabdādiṣṭasādhanatāmeva jñātvā pravartata iti tatvanirṇayavākyārtha iti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: liṅ ādi śabdāt iṣṭasādhanatām eva jñātvā pravartate iti tatva nirṇaya vākya arthaḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: etena -- karmanirṇayaṭīkāyāṃ kṛtisādhyatvaṃ pravartakajñānakoṭau na praveśitam /
tatvanirṇayaṭīkāyāṃ tu pravartakajñānaviṣayatābhimatakāryatākoṭau kṛtisādhyatvasya praveśāttasyāpi pravartakajñānaviṣayakauṭau praveśaḥ kṛtaḥ
analyzed: tatvanirṇaya ṭīkāyām tu pravartaka jñāna viṣayatā abhimata kāryatā koṭau kṛti sādhya tvasya praveśāt tasya api pravartaka jñāna viṣayaka oṭau praveśaḥ kṛtaḥ
iti nirṇaya ṭīkayoḥ virodhaḥ iti api nirastam
ubhayatra liṅga ādi janya jñāna viṣaya koṭau apraveśa abhiprāyasya ukta tvāt
mātram iti adhikam jaka naṃrāsu

original: yadvā śabdajanyamiṣṭasādhanatvajñānameva pravartakaṃ mānāntarajanyaṃ yāgādeḥ kṛtisādhyatvajñānaṃ
analyzed: yat vā śabda janyam iṣṭa sādhana tva jñānam eva pravartakam māna antara janyam yāga ādeḥ kṛti sādhya tva jñānam

original: tu phalaṃ kṛtyā sādhayiṣyāmīti kṛtisādhyatvaprakārikā yāvaśyakī phalecchā tadutpādanopakṣīṇam /
analyzed: tu phalam kṛtyā sādhayiṣyāmi iti kṛti sādhya tva prakārikā yā āvaśyakī phala icchā tat utpādana upakṣīṇam
na tu pravartakam

original: tathā ca sudhā kṛtisādhyatvajñānasya sākṣādupayoganiṣedhikā nirṇayaṭīke tu paraṃparopayogapare itina virodhaḥ //
analyzed: tathā ca sudhā kṛti sādhya tva jñānasya sākṣāt upayoga niṣedhikā nirṇayaṭīke tu paraṃparā upayoga pare iti na virodhaḥ
kecid tu śabda janyam iṣṭa sādhanatva jñānam eva pravartakam

original: takṣakacaḍūmaṇyāharaṇādau tu mānāntarajanyaṃ kṛtyasādhyatvajñānaṃ pratibandhakamiti kṛtisādhyatvajñānaṃ pratabandhakanirāsāpekṣaṇim / @-------------------------------------------------------------------------
analyzed: takṣaka caḍūmaṇi āharaṇa ādau tu māna antara janyam kṛtya sādhya tva jñānam pratibandhakam iti kṛti sādhya tva jñānam
evam kṛti sādhya tva jñānasya pravṛtti hetu tvam sarva grantha abhimatam
liṅ ādi janyam tat iti eva na abhimatam iti upetya virodhaḥ parihṛtaḥ

original: adhunā kṛtisādhyatvajñānasya sākṣātpravṛttihetutvaṃ na kvāpyabhimatamityupetya virodhaṃ prakārāntareṇa nirāha -- yadveti //
analyzed: adhunā kṛti sādhya tva jñānasya sākṣāt pravṛtti hetu tvam na kvāpi abhimatam iti upetya virodham prakāra antareṇa nirāha yat vā iti
māna antara iti
prāgukta anumāna rūpeṇa iti arthaḥ
jñānam tu iti astha upakṣīṇam iti anvayaḥ
śabdanyam iti
liṅga ādi śabda janyam iti arthaḥ
atra aruci bījam tu kṛtya sādhya tva jñāna apekṣayā kṛti sādhya tva jñānasya eva ukta ādiśā upayoga kalpanam laghu
kiñca kṛtya sādhya tva jñānasya pratibandhaka tvam kāraṇībhūta kiñcid vighaṭaka tvena eva upeyam iti

original: kṛtisādhyatvajñānasya vā kṛtisādhyatvaprakārakaphalecchāya vā vidhaṭaneneti vācyamiti
analyzed: kṛti sādhya tva jñānasya vā kṛti sādhya tva prakāraka phala icchāya vā vidhaṭanena iti vācyam iti
evam sati nirṇaya dvaya ṭīkā stha pravṛtti pada prayoga svārasyam ca iti dhyeyam
kṛ sātva ādi ṣṭesātva vitu aṅgaḥ
vidhi vādaḥ
pratibindhaka abhāvaḥ ca sarva kārya apekṣitaḥ
evam ca sudhā kṛti sādhya tva jñānasya ananyathā siddhi niṣedhikā

original: nirṇayaṭīke tu upayogamātrāstitvapare iti na virodha ityāhuḥ//
analyzed: nirṇayaṭīke tu upayoga mātra astitva pare iti na virodhaḥ iti āhuḥ
tasmāt vidhi pratyayaḥ iṣṭa sādhanatva bodhanena eva pravṛtti hetuḥ
phala icchā tu ātma manaḥ saṃyoga ādi vat sva rūpa satī iṣṭa sādhana viṣayaka kṛti rūpapa pravṛtti hetuḥ

original: sā ca sādhanaviṣayaka 1 kṛtiṃ prati kiñcidantaritāṣa'pi svavirodhivyāpārānantaritā pravṛttiheturiti tvayāpi svīkāryam //
analyzed: sā ca sādhana viṣayaka kṛtim prati sva virodhi vyāpāra anantaritā pravṛtti hetuḥ iti tvayā api svīkāryam
tat evam pravṛtti nivṛttayoḥ liṅā gagī artha bhūta iṣṭa aniṣṭa sādhana tve

original: nanu -- yaduktaṃ prākphalecchāyāṃ sādhane cikārṣākṛtī bhavata iti,
analyzed: nanu yat uktam prāk phala icchāyām sādhane cikārṣa ākṛtī bhavataḥ iti
tat ayuktam

original: sādhanacikīrṣayā vyavahitā satī phaleccha kathaṃ sādhanagocarakṛtiṃ pratihetuḥ syādityāśaṅkāṃ
analyzed: sādhana cikīrṣayā vyavahitā satī phala iccha katham sādhana gocara kṛtim prati hetuḥ syāt iti āśaṅkām

original: pariharan ṭīkādyavirodhokterupayogaṃ ca vivakṣuḥ pravṛttihetuṃ viṣkṛṣya darśayati -- tasmāditi //
analyzed: pariharan ṭīkā ādi avirodha ukteḥ upayogam ca vivakṣuḥ pravṛtti hetum viṣkṛṣya darśayati tasmāt iti
hetuḥ iti anena anvayaḥ
yat vā kṛti sādhya tva jñānasya sākṣāt pravṛtti hetu tva abhāvāt iti arthaḥ
nanu iṣṭa aniṣṭa sādhanatā jñāne eva pravṛtti nivṛtti hetū iti ayuktam
rāga dveṣayoḥ api kāminī saṃbhoga sarpa daṃśana ādau pravṛtti nivṛtti hetu tā upalabdheḥ
bāvasya stanya pāna ādau iṣṭa sādhanatā bodhaka śabda abhāvāt ca iti āśāṅkām nivārayan eva bhaṅga artham upasaṃharati tat evam iti
kā ja ka tuḥ iti anaṃu

original: -- jñāte rāgadveṣau tu svarūpasantau hetū bālasyādyapravṛttāviṣṭasādhanatājñānaṃ tu jīvanādṛṣṭabalena janmāntarīyasaṃskārāditi sarvaṃ sustham
analyzed: jñāte rāga dveṣau tu svarūpa santau hetū bālasya ādi apravṛttau iṣṭa sādhana tā jñānam tu jīvana adṛṣṭa balena janma antarīya saṃskārāt iti sarvam sustham
jñātam sat yat pravṛti ādi kāraṇam tat iṣṭa sādhanatva ādi rūpam eva iti uktau doṣa abhāvāt iti bhāvaḥ
